snippet: The Orioles won their final home game of the regular season, and an Angels loss in Game 2 of a doubleheader helped Baltimore clinch its first playoff berth since 1997.
abstract: Baltimore Orioles defeat Boston Red Sox, 6-3, to clinch its first playoff berth since 1997.
lead_paragraph: The Orioles won their final home game of the regular season, and an Angels loss in Game 2 of a doubleheader helped Baltimore clinch its first playoff berth since 1997.

headline.seo: Orioles’ Playoff Party Is Put Off, but Only for a Few Hours
headline.main: Orioles’ Party Is Put Off, but Only for a Few Hours
headline.print_headline: Orioles’ Party Is Put Off, But Only for a Few Hours
